definition: (literary) to be exactly like/to be exactly as if

sentences.english: Asia Hollywood is a scenic movie studio abound with photo opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 儼如電影工場，有很多場景可供拍照。

sentences.english: We had dark side of the mood and we were touring animals.
sentences.chinese: 我們也有情緒低落的時候，儼如遊離狀態的動物。

sentences.english: We had dark-sided mood and we were touring animals.
sentences.chinese: 我們也有情緒低落的時候，儼如遊離狀態的動物。

sentences.english: He is a high-handed tyrant in his office.
sentences.chinese: 他在辦公室裏儼如一個專制暴君。
我覺得自己儼如一個國王。
